about.heading: About me
paragraphs: I design clear, human-centered learning and digital experiences that help people actually understand things — not just get through them. My background combines UX, instructional design, and hands-on content development, with years of experience building training programs, digital learning products, and interactive tools for real users, under real constraints.

I’ve led and developed learning experiences for educational organizations, nonprofits, and public institutions — from concept and structure, through content, UX, and delivery. I’m especially focused on clarity, usability, and making complex ideas feel simple, grounded, and useful.
Clarifind is where I bring that approach to clients who want learning solutions that are thoughtful, practical, and built to work — not just to look good.
